For more info. kindly call at IN Toll Free:18004193033 or 01246233502 b/w 0800–2000hrs (MON-FRI), 0900-1700hrs(SAT-SUN & PH

@asheeshsisar We regret the inconvenience caused to you. Kindly share your baggage tag/file reference no. with us via a direct message only for our teams to investigate. Regards,

data.text: @KULTARSINGHBAI1 @AirFranceFR We regret the inconvenience caused to you. To help us serve you better, we request you to kindly share your feedback via https://t.co/M2pSFkO782.   Regards,

@rahul8172q Dear Rahul, kindly connect with our Customer Contact Centre, India Toll Free: 1800 4193 033 or + 91 124 623 3502 b/w 0800hrs – 2000hrs (MON-FRI), 0900hrs-1700hrs(SAT-SUN & public holidays) for booking wheelchair service. Regards,

@desiboho Thank you for reaching out to us. Operations ex India are in accordance to "Air Bubble Agreement" scope and process https://t.co/XaBfqr54N2. For more info., kindly connect at India Toll Free: 18004193033 or +911246233502 b/w 0800hrs – 2000hrs (MON-FRI), 0900-1700hrs(SAT-SUN & PH)

@rahul8172q Hello Rahul, there is an option book a wheelchair during the booking process. You can select the valid reason - old age/unable to walk distance etc. while requesting for the same. Regards,
